message.content:
1. My sister was half my age when I was 6. So, my sister's age when I was 6 was 6/2 = 3.
2. Now, I am 80. So, my sister's age when I am 80 is 80 - 6 = 74.
3. To find out how old my sister is now, we can subtract the age when I was 6 from the age when I am 80: 74 - 3 = 71.
4. Therefore, my sister is 71 years old now..
